title: Light Bulb Circuit MicroSim
description: Interactive circuit simulation demonstrating a switch-controlled light bulb with animated current flow visualization
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Electric Circuits
Light Bulbs
Switches
Current Flow
Energy Conversion
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of light bulb circuit
Explore light bulb circuit through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of light bulb circuit to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on light bulb circuit
